title: Russia Bankruptcies
description: Bankruptcies in Russia increased to 2831 Companies in the fourth quarter of 2021 from 2462 Companies in the third quarter of 2021. Bankruptcies in Russia averaged 2679.25 Companies from 2007 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 3770 Companies in the fourth quarter of 2017 and a record low of 1103 Companies in the third quarter of 2007. This page provides - Russia Bankruptcies- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Unified Federal Register of Information on Bankruptcy
